Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Phenomenal soups. I'm not the biggest fan of the salads, but like everything else they're super fresh and so tasty! Highly recommend

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Excellent soups, and very varied. We tried the chilli con carne, lentil soup, tomato soup and Thai pumpkin soup and all four were excellent. Highly recommended.

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Really tasty, homemade and fresh! Had the fish soup and mushroom soup with a side of salad and goat cheese quiche!!! There were vegan, vegetarian and meat options available

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Simple and cool place to get soup and salad. Ingredients are fresh and well used. Variety of meat and vegan/vegetarian options.

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: This place is a gem! I accidentally have found it while roaming around the city. What can be better than a bowl of a freshly cooked delicious soup during a rainy chilly day? Only two bowls of their soup :) Simple yet cozy interior. Highly recommend this place!

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: The soup was OK but well, it is a soup. What I didn't like was the attention of the store woman and the fact that you pay for the "Large" cup to get an amount of soup that would comfortably fit in a "Small" one.

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Super fresh and hearty soups with multiple vegan and veggie options - Along with fresh salad & bread! Of the 4 odd years that we lived in Amsterdam, we frequented this Soup en Zo every Saturday for our soup-salad brunch as it was so close …

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Fantastic place for lunch. Healthy and tasty food. Great variety of delicious soups and well made salads. Friendly and prompt service.

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: 5* to the divine soups they serve in this place. Many options, mainly veggie, freshly made and served with a nice (very small tho) bread roll. Great place for a quick lunch! The service could improve, like everywhere else in Amsterdam..

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Stumbled across this place while exploring the city,  deciding to stop here for lunch with a friend. …

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Hidden gem, a little place like this so near Museumplein! Cheap and quick, no frills. A medium bowl of soup is €5.60.

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Best food ever! I am vegan and they have so many options of healthy hearty soups to choose from. Best take away option in the city. They have three locations. The spinach coconut soup is to die for so be there early to get it before it runs …

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Great wholesome soups and friendly service.

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: great selection of soup and salads!

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Great place for the cold days in Amsterdam. Good healty food with excellent variety of soups. I would have give it 5 stars if there were more places to seat near a decent table. Overall its good value for your money.

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Vegan mis-serve. I took my salad back after a bite. I explained at the counter as I ordered vegan soup I was vegan while picking the salad. No apology was given. …

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: one of my favourite places for quality lunch. the van baerle location lacks coziness in my opinion; perhaps it will pick it up with time. however, it’s the best one to eat in, as spiegelgracht and waterlooplein locations don’t have the …

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Very nice! Awesome soups:)

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Where have you been all my life? I think your Pumpkin soup just cured my illness. Will be visiting lots as I live 150 metres away and want to try everything! Thank you for making delicious food.

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: The most exelent fast food option for a meal thats filling and healty while warming you up on a cold day. The shop is simple and clean with fast service and the menu items seem to vary regularly with popular options selling out fast!

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Absolutely amazing vegan soups, full of flavour, good portion sizes and prices. The peanut, banana and sweet potato soup was bliss. A must stop after the Van Gogh museum. #VeganAmsterdam

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Came here for the rating and expected excellent soups, as this is a soup place - well - it was mediocre, at best…

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Had a horrific case of food poisoning after having eaten here. My friend ate the same food and was sick as well. My husband is a doctor . Symptoms of Staphylococcal infection. Salads are improperly cooled. The management denies any responsibility. Be forewarned.

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Liked the Moroccan chicken soup and loved the potato and leek one. Pricing is fair. The place is nice for a casual lunch with a friend or even alone.

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Organic soup, also big sized. The peanut soup is spicy and perfect in winter time. There is free bread that comes with it and tap water on the table.

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Tons of vegan soups and a la carte items, such as baked parsnips, quinoa salad, hummus, and seasoned potatoes.

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text:
You can find the friendliest and humble people working here.
Food smells great and they cook it fresh in front of you every day!
Thanks Sam for everything!
